scenarios.name: Black Friday Disaster
scenarios.description: Baseline system orders normal quantities, misses 2.36x demand spike

scenarios.name: Supply Disruption Blindness
scenarios.description: System doesnt anticipate port delays, causes extended stockouts

scenarios.name: MOQ Optimization Failure
scenarios.description: Orders 80-99% of discount threshold, misses bulk savings

scenarios.name: Multi-Product Consolidation Waste
scenarios.description: Separate orders to same supplier on same day = extra shipping

scenarios.name: Supplier Selection Inefficiency
scenarios.description: Fixed supplier assignment ignores cost-effective alternatives
